front.title: LDAP: matching rules for facsimile telephone numbers

abstract.t: Based on changes to the 4th edition of X.500, this document updatesthe Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP). It defines anequality and a substrings matching rule for the 'Facsimile TelephoneNumber' syntax and updates the 'facsimileTelephoneNumber' attributetype to use them.
